section.section: Subject to the approval of the Secretary, the Commission shall adopt regulations governing its policies and activities under this title.

Notwithstanding the provisions of § 10-101(g)(2)(i) of the State Government Article, regulations adopted under paragraph (1) of this subsection shall comply with Title 10, Subtitle 1 of the State Government Article.

text.section:
The Commission may adopt regulations governing:
the conduct of proceedings before it or the hearing examiners; and
the review and disposition of written exceptions to the recommendation of a hearing examiner.
